00001 // File:        any.hpp
00002 // Description: ---
00003 // Notes:       ---
00004 // Author:      leoxiang <leoxiang727@qq.com>
00005 // Revision:    2015-07-01 by leoxiang
00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <iostream>
00010 #include <string>
00011 #include <memory>
00012 #include <typeindex>
00013 
00014 namespace lsf {
00015 namespace basic {
00016 
00017 class Any {
00018 public:
00019     // constructor
00020     Any() : _type_index(typeid(void)) {}
00021 
00022     Any(Any const& rhs) : _ptr(rhs._ptr->Clone()), _type_index(rhs._type_index) {}
00023 
00024     Any(Any&& rhs) : _ptr(std::move(rhs._ptr)), _type_index(rhs._type_index) {}
00025 
00026     template<typename RealType,
00027         class = typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<typename std::decay<RealType>::type, Any>::value, RealType>::type>
00028     Any(RealType&& value) :
00029         _ptr(new Derived<typename std::decay<RealType>::type>(std::forward<RealType>(value))),
00030         _type_index(typeid(typename std::decay<RealType>::type)) {}
00031 
00032     // copy assignment
00033     Any& operator=(Any const& rhs) {
00034         if (_ptr == rhs._ptr) return *this;
00035         _ptr = rhs._ptr->Clone();
00036         _type_index = rhs._type_index;
00037         return *this;
00038     }
00039 
00040     Any& operator=(Any&& rhs) {
00041         if (_ptr == rhs._ptr) return *this;
00042         _ptr = rhs._ptr->Transfer();
00043         _type_index = rhs._type_index;
00044         return *this;
00045     }
00046 
00047     // common func
00048     explicit operator bool() const { return !_ptr; }
00049 
00050     template<class RealType>
00051     bool Is() const { return _type_index == std::type_index(typeid(typename std::decay<RealType>::type)); }
00052 
00053     template<class RealType>
00054     typename std::decay<RealType>::type& Cast() {
00055         if (!Is<RealType>()) throw std::bad_cast();
00056         auto derived = dynamic_cast<Derived<typename std::decay<RealType>::type>*>(_ptr.get());
00057         return derived->value;
00058     }
00059 
00060     template<class RealType>
00061     typename std::decay<RealType>::type const& Cast() const {
00062         if (!Is<RealType>()) throw std::bad_cast();
00063         auto derived = dynamic_cast<Derived<typename std::decay<RealType>::type>*>(_ptr.get());
00064         return derived->value;
00065     }
00066 
00067 private:
00068     struct Base {
00069         virtual ~Base() {}
00070         virtual std::unique_ptr<Base> Clone() const = 0;
00071         virtual std::unique_ptr<Base> Transfer() const = 0;
00072     };
00073 
00074     template<typename RealType>
00075     struct Derived : public Base {
00076         template<typename OtherType>
00077         Derived(OtherType&& value) : value(std::forward<OtherType>(value)) { }
00078         std::unique_ptr<Base> Clone()    const { return std::unique_ptr<Base>(new Derived<RealType>(value)); }
00079         std::unique_ptr<Base> Transfer() const { return std::unique_ptr<Base>(new Derived<RealType>(std::move(value))); }
00080         RealType value;
00081     };
00082 
00083 private:
00084     std::unique_ptr<Base> _ptr;
00085     std::type_index _type_index;
00086 };
00087 
00088 } // end namespace basic
00089 } // end namespace lsf
00090
